abstract: The German automaker's volume leader is fitted for 2012 with the twin-scroll turbocharged 4-cylinder that appears currently in the Z4 sDrive28i, as well as a new 8-speed automatic transmission.
snippet: The German automaker's volume leader is fitted for 2012 with the twin-scroll turbocharged 4-cylinder that appears currently in the Z4 sDrive28i, as well as a new 8-speed automatic transmission.
lead_paragraph: The sixth iteration of the BMW 3 Series sedan, arriving at United States dealers in February, has grown bigger in terms of wheelbase and overall length, smaller in terms of the engine bay and more efficient all around. It remains, however, thoroughly recognizable as the brand's volume-leading saloon.

headline.main: Wider, Wedgier BMW 3 Series Gets a 4-Cylinder Engine for 2012
